biotools.summary: MEM (Multi-Experiment Matrix) provides gene expression similarity searches, visualisation and analyses across many datasets from ArrayExpress and GEO. MEM uses rank aggregation to merge information from different datasets into a single global ordering with simultaneous statistical significance estimation. Each dataset can be also accessed through ExpressView gene clustering and visualisation, and DiffExp for differential expressed genes search.

bioschemas.name: Multi Experiment Matrix (MEM)
